CustomField.formula:
AND(Account.NSS_WorkablePayroll__c ,OwnerId != $Label.ReferralOwnerName ,Sales_Contact__c=true ,DoNotCall=false ,ISPICKVAL(NSSStatus__c ,"Disqualified")=false ,ISPICKVAL(Hold_Out_Reason__c,'Bank Referral')=false /*,DuplicatePhone_Pay__c = false*/ , Owner.Alias != "rown" ,NOT(Account.AdvancedPartnerClients__c) ,NOT(ISPICKVAL( Hold_Out_Reason__c , 'Paychex Referral Network'))
)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Is this workable by the Payroll (Core and MMS) groups in NSS?
CustomField.label: NSS Workable-Payroll
